mainSequence.step: Logged-in User clicks on the garbage bin under "financial goal" which is only visible to the owner.
User enters the amount to delete the financial goal.
GUI sends a delete request for the financial goal to the server.
Server processes the delete request and sends a delete command to the database for the financial goal ID.
Database deletes the financial goal ID and returns the updated financial account data.
Server returns the updated financial account data to the GUI.
GUI displays the updated financial account details.
